question: 検討する
sourceAnswer: To Examine, To Study, To Look Into
activeAnswer: To Examine, To Study, To Look Into
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>examine</kanji> it but you also <kanji>chastise</kanji> it, because you want to make sure this examining is correct. This is <vocabulary>to examine</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to study</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to look into</vocabulary>. All require chastising things to be sure for sure.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
